title: TechMatters:" Qiqqa" than you can say Reference Management: A Tool to Organize the Research Process
abstract_html: There are a variety of methods to add items to a library including selecting a file or whole folder from within Windows Explorer: dragging and dropping a file into the list pane; importing from another program (eg, EndNote, Zotero, Jab Ref, Mendeley or any program that exports to BibTex format); or by manually typing citation information into a template. You can also designate a “watch folder” on your computer so that when new PDF files are added there, they are automatically imported into Qiqqa When PDFs are first added to a library …
